items.translated_title: DOJ says Trenchant boss sold exploits to Russian broker capable of accessing ‘millions of computers and devices’
items.content: The former boss of the L3Harris-owned hacking and surveillance tools maker Trenchant faces nine years in prison for selling several exploits to a Russian broker, which counts the Russian government among its customers.

items.content: UpScrolled, a social network that surged in the wake of the U.S. TikTok deal, has seen an uptick in harmful content, including usernames and hashtags that contain racial slurs.

items.translated_title: Samsung to hold its Galaxy S26 event on February 25

images.alt: SEOUL, SOUTH KOREA - AUGUST 25: The Samsung logo is displayed at the Samsung office on August 25, 2017 in Seoul, South Korea. Prosecutors are seeking a 12-year jail sentence. Lee, de facto chief of South Korean conglomerate, faces five charges connecting the bribery scandal involving ousted former President Park Geun-hye and her confidant Choi Soon-sil. The verdict affects the business of Samsung, which has launched new Galaxy Note 8 smartphone to wipe out the misery of exploding Note 7 last year. (Photo by Chung Sung-Jun/Getty Images)

items.content: Samsung is going to launch the S26 lineup just before Mobile World Congress (MWC).
